title: Drawing, "Design for  a clock", 1800–25
medium: Brush and yellow, red watercolor, black wash, on cream laid paper
inscribed: Below left: Le petit liparite eeg. No 98
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Clock sits on footed base, lower panel decorated with intertwining leaves and branches. Bottom portion of clock decorated with rosettes, cornucopia, and central mask. Above dial, a horn and a quiver. At left, a boy in a helmet, holding a dog. A spear and bow lean against clock.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for  a clock", 1800–25.
1800–25. Brush and yellow, red watercolor, black wash, on cream laid paper. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1931-71-15.
